menu.name: Wai-Wai Sadeko
menu.description: Classic Nepali snack, Waiwai brand dried noodle mixed with ginger, onion, cilantro, tomatoes lemon juices, chilly powder pepper, and scallion.

menu.name: Pani Puri
menu.description: Round/ball-shaped, hollow puri (a deep-fried crisp flatbread), filled with a mixture of flavored water, tamarind chutney, chili powder, chaat masala, potato mash, onion or chickpeas.

menu.name: Samosa
menu.description: Fried pastry with a savory filling of spiced potatoes, onions, peas served with tamarind chutney and mint-cilantro chutney.

menu.name: Steamed Momo (8PCS)
menu.description: Steamed chicken dumplings served with achar (spicy tomato sauce w/ sesame).

menu.name: Hut Special (8PCS)
menu.description: Homemade colorful dumplings steamed and served with achar (spicy tomato sauce w/ sesame).

menu.name: Jhol Moomo
menu.description: Steamed dumplings with jhol achar (soupy tomato sauce) thin in consistency and have a bit of a hot, spicy, and tangy twist.

menu.name: Veg Momo (8PCS)
menu.description: Homemade veg dumplings steamed and served with achar (spicy tomato sauce w/ sesame).

menu.name: Fried Momo (8PCS)
menu.description: Homemade veg/chicken dumplings deep fried and served with achar (spicy tomato sauce w/ sesame).

menu.name: Chana Bhature
menu.description: Chickpeas(Chana) in a delicious red sauce of onions and tomato with a puffy, flaky bread(Bhature).

menu.name: Saag Paneer
menu.description: Paneer in a thick paste made from pur√©ed spinach thicened with coconut milk.

menu.name: Matar Paneer
menu.description: Paneer and peas in a tomato based sauce, spiced with garam masala.

menu.name: Thali
menu.description: Rice served with two sel roti, chana gravy, achar, gundruk ko tarkari, aloo gobi, matar paneer chicken curry and goat stew. Meat can be substituted for veg curries.

menu.name: Chhaang/Tongba
menu.description: Nepali alcoholic beverage made by brewing fermented rice and millet with ginger and aconite added to enhance flavour.

menu.name: Nepali Chiya
menu.description: Black tea boiled with milk, water and aromatic herbs and spices served in a glass.

menu.name: Lassi
menu.description: Blend of yogurt, water, spices and fruit. Choose between Sweet, Mango or Strawberry.

menu.name: Juju Dhau
menu.description: Nepali yogurt made with buffalo milk and served in a clay pot.

menu.name: Kulfi
menu.description: Nepali ice cream made with milk, sugar, nuts and cardamoms. Choose between Plain/Mango/Pistachio.
